item.title: Tableau - Creating a Waffle Chart
item.description: Waffles are for Breakfast It’s been a long time since my last update and I’ve decided to start with Tableau, of all topics! Although open source advocates do not look kindly upon Tableau, I find myself using it frequently and relearning all the stuff I can do in R. For my series of “how-to’s” regarding Tableau, I’d like to start with posting about how to make a waffle chart in Tableau.
